text.section: If the president or cashier of any state depository willfully violates any of the provisions of KRS 41.230, 41.240, 41.270 or 41.320, he shall be fined not less than one thousand dollars ($1,000).

Any officer, agent or employee of any budget unit who willfully fails or refuses to comply with, or expends any money in violation of, any of the provisions of KRS 41.070, 41.110 to 41.170, 41.210, 41.220, 41.260, 41.270, 41.290 or 41.300 shall be subject to indictment in the Franklin Circuit Court, and upon conviction shall be fined not less than fifty (50) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500) for each offense.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1992b-63, 4694.
